cMessage: No charges if either party cancels at any time prior to departure time. If deposit was paid by the passenger ahead of time, driver must refund full deposit.
aTitle: GoU is a simple web app for travellers to find each other on road trips across the Great Lakes region in the USA and Canada. It’s a wholly owned product by 3MA LLC. All rights reserved.
aMessage: GoU “走你” 是一个简单的网络平台用来帮助在五大湖地区出行的朋友们找到用车伙伴（包括美国和加拿大）。不管你有没有车，我们都欢迎您的使用！本产品全部属于 3MA LLC。侵权必究。
